entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Mingan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Longue-Pointe-de-Mingan 5:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -14

Wind: WNW 12 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
